summary: The diff only updates project_state.json with planning/metadata entries and does not perform any deployment, verification, or provide a live IC URL. It also violates the constraint/AC that no project files be modified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Deploy the existing project to the Internet Computer as-is (frontend static assets + backend canister) using the repository’s current files, dependencies, configuration, and folder structure, without modifying any code/assets/config/structure; site publicly accessible on IC mainnet.
missing_requirements.reason: No deployment-related files or configuration changes are shown, and no evidence of deploying frontend + backend canisters or making the site publicly accessible is present in the diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: After deployment, verify the live site end-to-end (all routes/pages load, navigation works, assets render, and browser console has zero warnings/errors).
missing_requirements.reason: No verification steps, test artifacts, logs, or any evidence of end-to-end validation are present; only a project state metadata update is shown.

missing_requirements.requirement: Provide the final live public URL for the hosted website as the only output (no additional text).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff contains no live URL output and does not show any step that would produce a deployed canister URL.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified project_state.json to add internal tracking items (AR-1..AR-4), architectural notes, and a deployment/verification summary.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly constrains the work to deploy/host without modifying any project files; changing project_state.json is not requested and violates the “no modifications” acceptance criteria.
